:orphan:



.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples:

Examples Gallery
================

The examples gallery provides working code samples demonstrating what
can be done with the sparse_ho library.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Plot utils">

.. only:: html

 .. figure:: /auto_examples/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_utils_thumb.png
     :alt: Plot utils

     :ref:`sphx_glr_auto_examples_plot_utils.py`

.. raw:: html

    </div>
